segments.text: From where I'm watching, the kitchen looks bright and domestic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is absorbed in drying that plate, towel bunched up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over the sink edge in a steady flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pooling on the floor, and she's stepping in it unknowingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste of water; this is so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy on the stool is stretching for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet door is open, jar full and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is out, ready to receive a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool seems ready to collapse under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
